My name is Sawyer Vaughan

I am an Electrical and Computer Engineer currently studying at the Olin College of Engineering.

ABOUT

I am an Electrical and Computer Engineer studying at the Olin College of Engineering. I enjoy working on electrical and embedded systems, but programming is my passion.

2016

iOS Developer | Onshape

I worked as an iOS Developer intern at Onshape. Learn more about Onshape at onshape.com.

2015

Co-Founder and Lead iOS Developer | Boolio

I was a co-founder and the Lead iOS Developer for Boolio. Boolio is a social questions app for iOS and Android. See more at boolio.io.

2015

App Developer | Games for Pebble

I created Games for Pebble, an application for Pebble smartwatches. The application, coded in the C language, currently features seven games and has been installed over twenty thousand times. View the app here.

2014

Android Developer | Response Care

I was an Android developer for Response Care. Response Care helps caregivers provide quality care, safety and security for eldercare and senior living by providing state-of-the-art, reliable communications.
